NAME: 思特沃克软件技术有限公司
DISCRIPTION: 职责描述：  你是否常常纠结于兴趣与职业发展如何取舍？或者根本不清楚应该怎么发展属于你的职业生涯？ 你是否喜欢编程但又不敢确定编程这条路究竟能走多远？  如果你也同样的热爱代码如生命，喜欢有事没事就记录和分享自己的思考与实践，希望远离办公室政治，追求公平合理，追求成为一名优秀的程序猿，攻城狮。那无容置疑ThoughtWorks绝对适合你！ 作为一家企业，ThoughtWorks不仅关注盈利，更不断追求世界领先的软件技术，并且凭借我们的技术与热情为世界的公平与正义做出贡献。  加入ThoughtWorks. 你将和一群Geeks(极客)在编码中一较高下！ 加入 ThoughtWorks.你将和世界顶尖的咨询师一起，享受在帮助客户解决棘手问题之后的快感！ 加入ThoughtWorks. 你将在不同国家、不同项目、不同技术中快速成长！ 加入ThoughtWorks. 你将与中国最优秀的技术社区领导者并肩作战！ 加入ThoughtWorks. 你将有机会用自己的智慧和专业的技术能力帮助弱者！  不足的技术经验、不流利的英语，都不是阻止你成为ThoughtWorker与成长的关键。你积极上进的学习态度与能力将是你不断进取、融入ThoughtWorks的最好动力！ ThoughtWorks，一个牛人辈出、业界领先、关注社会平等的IT咨询公司，真诚邀请你的加入！   Mobile Application Developer(IOS/Android)  ThoughtWorks isn’t your average company. so we don’t hire average people.  From a technology perspective. ThoughtWorks is synonymous with innovation. We’ve been at the forefront of innovation on the Java platform. and have pioneered the use of techniques such as Inversion of Control and Domain Specific Languages. We’ve made significant contributions to the Java Open Source community via projects such as CruiseControl. XStream and Selenium.  ThoughtWorks is also a Microsoft Gold Certified Partner and our people provide thought leadership to key Microsoft initiatives such as the Patterns and Practices effort. Most recently we’re becoming famous for the work we’re doing with alternative .net languages like IronRuby. Iron Python. F# and Ioke. We champion Ruby on Rails and ThoughtWorks is already the natural home for some of the world’s leading Ruby developers.  By joining ThoughtWorks. you become part of a community. ThoughtWorkers are a passionate. diverse bunch. Typical ThoughtWorker traits include enjoying arguing about tiny details of language implementation; complaining about Maven and discussing how close to 1K they are. People join because they get to talk to the people who wrote the books that influenced them (and often get invited to help review or contribute to the author’s next one) and work with the people who wrote the tools they couldn’t get their previous company to use.  Add to this our focus on Agile delivery and you’ll start to see why working here is refreshingly different.  We hire only the most talented. passionate people. We're seeking a creative approach to problem-solving and a track record of technical innovation. We work almost exclusively on customer site providing a mix of delivery and consulting services. so you’ll be flexible about travel. and willing to travel extensively as part of your role. You want to go the extra mile. and relish the idea of being part of a community that extends beyond the work we do for our customers.   To be considered. you'll have experience of the following:  Experience in mobile software development. skill in Objective-C / Java / C# Have worked on the analysis. design. coding and implementation of large scale. custom built object-oriented applications Great OO skills. including strong design patterns knowledge Experience working with. or an interest in Agile Methodologies. such as Extreme Programming (XP) and Scrum Knowledge of software best practices. like test driven development and continuous integration Experience of working in a forward thinking. OSS-centric environment  Interested?  If you are interested in taking on an opportunity that offers variety. innovation. and unique challenge every day. then we should talk. 任职要求：
